TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XamlDeferringLoader extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a XAML reader behavior that loads and returns deferred content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is not used as a base class by other XAML readers that are implemented by .NET Framework XAML Services. Instead, it is used internally for value-passing by readers such as <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>; or it is used as a base class for a technology-specific implementation, such as <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader> from PresentationFramework.dll.

Docs.related: Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts

Docs.param: The initiating reader that is returned on calls to .
The service provider for the required services.
Docs.summary: Loads XAML content in a deferred mode, which is based on a and certain required services from a service provider.
Docs.returns: The root object that is produced by the input .

Docs.param: The input value to commit for deferred loading.
The service provider for the required services.
Docs.summary: Commits a value for deferred loading.
Docs.returns: A XAML reader that can be used to obtain the deferred value as XAML node information.
